title: 截止2019年，洛杉矶警察局50%的警察是墨西哥裔，大家对此有何看法？
contents:
As of 2019, the Los Angeles Police Department had 10,008 officers sworn in. Of these, 81% (8,158) were male and 19% (1,850) female. The racial/ethnic breakdown:[89]


  • 48.8% or 4,882 was Hispanic/Latino (of any race)

  • 30.9% or 3,090 was non-Hispanic White

  • 9.62% or 962 was African American

  • 7.66% or 766 was Asian

  • 2.46 % or 246 was Filipino American

  • remaining were Indian and Other Ethnicities.




1980年代，80%的洛杉矶警察局警员是非拉丁裔白人。
